title: pUjittunnai
sahitya:
pUjittunnaip-pOTri yAcikkum enniDam pUraNamAna krpai kUruvAi murugaiyE


anupallavi

  AshigaL kUri ennai AdarikkAdinnum yOcippadEn pazhani vAsA murugEsA


caraNam    kaiyilE poruLillAk-kavalaikkOr ellaiyillai poi puraTTAl kAsu parikkavO manamillai
vaiyagattE pizhaikkum vagaiyumE eLidillai ayyanE unai allAl AdarippOrillai illai
